54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي صِفَةِ الدَّجَّالِ وَتَحْرِيمِ الْمَدِينَةِ عَلَيْهِ وَقَتْلِهِ الْمُؤْمِنَ وَإِحْيَائِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Description Of Ad-Dajjal; Al-Madinah Is Forbidden To Him; He Will Kill A Believer And Bring Him Back To Life
